original_query: SELECT MIN(t.Id) FROM tags as t, posts as p, users as u, postHistory as ph, badges as b WHERE p.Id = t.ExcerptPostId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=0 AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-08-22 02:21:55' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM tags AS tags
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.CommentCount >= 0
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-22 02:21:55'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E3E4.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4E5 WHERE E1.ExcerptPostId=E2E3E4E5.Id)
